version_description: 1. Support hardware encoding on iOS7;

*****Important update for a serious problem *****
Fix the problem that  steamer goes offline, and viewer fails to connect to streamer.
(Be sure to update viewer and streamer to the latest version at the same time for better performance.)

1. Fixed the crash bug on iOS 6; 
2. Fixed the bug on some devices that the time-lapse video cannot be uploaded.
1. Fix the problem that sound comes out of the phone when connected to Bluetooth headphones.

1. Fix some bugs.
2. Optimize the purchase experience, Cloud Service can be renewed anytime before the expiration date.
1.Fix the bug that cloud videos cannot be uploaded for days.

1. Fixed the bug that timelapse video cannot be played in some cases;
2. Optimized the translation of Japanese;

1. Fixed the bug that the Ad can't be closed on iPhone4.
2. Fixed the bug that the steamer can't be online in some cases.
3. Fixed the memory leak bug.
1. Optimized the program.
1. Optimized motion detection.

Promote Human Body Recognition Capability
Promote Face Compare Capability
Optimize the connection speed of the streamer and improve the stability of the connection

1.Bug fixed
2.Optimization stability

1.AI Face Search
2.Optimize

1.Bug fixed
2.Optimization stability

Promote Human Body Recognition Capability
Promote Face Compare Capability

Great iterative upgrade!
1. The Vibration Detection Alarm function has been added - You can install the Athome Video Streamer app in an old phone and put it into the luggage case, into the drawer, on the door ... Once there is vibration, the AVS phone will automatically record a video and send out  notifications to you.
2. Alarm videos can be distinguished on the basis of different alarm types，such as Motion Detection Alarm Videos, Human Detection Alarm Videos ,Vibration Detection Alarm Videos...

1. The Vibration Detection Alarm function has been added - You can install the Athome Video Streamer app in an old phone and put it into the luggage case, into the drawer, on the door ... Once there is vibration, the AVS phone will automatically record a video and send out  notifications to you.
2. Alarm videos can be distinguished on the basis of different alarm types，such as Motion Detection Alarm Videos, Human Detection Alarm Videos ,Vibration Detection Alarm Videos... 
3. Fixed that some mobile phones did not receive alarm push messages.

Add Suspend Mode
-You can remote control the AVS by switching to a very power-saving suspend mode

1.New function: The "Athome Video Streamer" will automatically play your message when someone enters the monitoring area
2.If you speak Spain, please tell us the translation errors in the APP via support@ichano.com

1.New function: The "Athome Video Streamer" will automatically play your message when someone enters the monitoring area
2.If you speak Spanish, please tell us the translation errors in the APP via support@ichano.com

1、The app now works even if the phone's screen is turned off.
2、The app will send a cleanup notification when the phone runs out of memory.
Added the "Privacy Mask" function to protect the privacy area from monitoring
